column4: ubuntulog: but i have a problem coz i didn,t make a root password when i,m installing ubuntu
Ubuntu doesn't use the root password, that's normal.
so how can i install ubuntu?
Ubuntu uses sudo instead of a root account, `sudo [stuff] ` to run stuff as super user
how can i type this : deb http://archive.canonical.com/ubuntu dapper-commercial main    ?
you want to add that to your sources.list, so you'll open a text editor with sudo, and then edit it.  sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list or gksu gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
